tweet: To the idiots and FUDsters, I have not left IOHK or Cardano. Being an advisor for a project does not mean that I am abandoning or slowing down upon existing commitments. It is unbelievable the garbage being said on telegram and reddit. Cardano is my primary passion and work

IOHK’s latest blog post shares a quick run-through of how they use Nix to help develop and deploy Cardano. Rodney Lorrimar, DevOps engineer at IOHK, answers questions like what is Nix and why its chosen. Read it here:  https://t.co/zkvp62bM79

Are you in NYC? Then check out this dLab/Emurgo Fellowship Cardano Meetup happening on Feb 13. Nathan Kaiser, Chairman of CF will be hosting the first AMA session at the event! RSVP here:  https://t.co/fSkNpZIZ2r

Are you in NYC? Then check out this dLab/Emurgo Fellowship Cardano Meetup happening on Feb 13. There will be speakers from Emurgo and Cardano Foundation! RSVP here:  https://t.co/s6hxmBwVeX
